prompts.name: Marketing Strategy Proposal
prompts.description: This template aids the CMO in formulating a strategy. Tailor the {{specific audience segment}} to your primary customer base, {{proposed marketing channels}} to suit your most effective platforms, and {{desired KPIs}} should relate to marketing objectives.
prompts.content: Draft a marketing strategy for {{CMO's name}} targeting {{specific audience segment}} through {{proposed marketing channels}}. The strategy's effectiveness will be measured using {{desired KPIs}}.

prompts.name: Marketing Metrics Report
prompts.description: This template supports creating a report on vital marketing metrics. {{Key metrics}} could include customer retention rate or sales growth, {{marketing campaign}} represents the specific campaign you're assessing, and {{suggested improvements}} refers to ideas for future campaigns.
prompts.content: Develop a report for {{CMO's name}} detailing {{key metrics}} of the recent {{marketing campaign}} and include {{suggested improvements}} based on the data.

prompts.name: Branding Initiative Outline
prompts.description: This template helps outline a branding initiative. Fill {{branding elements}} with components like logo, tagline, etc., {{reason for rebranding}} could include market positioning changes, and {{implementation time-frame}} is the proposed schedule for the rebrand.
prompts.content: Assemble an outline for {{CMO's name}} for a branding initiative comprising {{branding elements}}. The reasons for this pivot, {{reason for rebranding}}, and expected {{implementation time-frame}} should be included.

prompts.name: Social Media Campaign
prompts.description: This template guides in creating a social media campaign. {{Campaign goals}} could be brand awareness or customer engagement, {{social media platforms}} refer to networks like Instagram, and {{success indicators}} could be likes, shares, etc.
prompts.content: Plan a comprehensive social media campaign for {{CMO's name}} with {{campaign goals}} to be met across {{social media platforms}}. The success of the campaign will be measured by {{success indicators}}.

prompts.name: Customer Feedback Analysis
prompts.description: This template aids in creating a customer feedback analysis. Replace {{feedback source}} with platforms like reviews or surveys, {{major strengths}} with positive feedback themes, and {{areas for improvement}} with common complaints.
prompts.content: Prepare an analysis of customer feedback for {{CMO's name}} from {{feedback source}}, highlighting {{major strengths}} and {{areas for improvement}}.

prompts.name: Partnership Proposal
prompts.description: This template supports crafting a proposal for potential partnerships. {{Potential partner}} could be a specific company or influencer, {{mutual benefits}} should detail projected gains, and {{proposed collaboration}} refers to the exact nature of the partnership.
prompts.content: Draft a partnership proposal for {{CMO's name}} to {{potential partner}}, outlining our {{mutual benefits}} and the nature of our {{proposed collaboration}}.

prompts.name: Content Marketing Strategy
prompts.description: This template is for creating a content marketing strategy. {{Content types}} represents forms of content like podcasts or blogs, {{distribution channels}} refer to where you'll publish, and {{engagement metrics}} could be views, likes, etc.
prompts.content: Structure a content marketing strategy for {{CMO's name}} featuring {{content types}}, to be disseminated across {{distribution channels}}, and monitored with {{engagement metrics}}.

prompts.name: Influencer Marketing Brief
prompts.description: This template aids in creating a brief for influencer marketing. {{Influencer name}} is the person you're collaborating with, {{campaign details}} refers to specifics of the collaboration, and {{expected outcomes}} are the desired results.
prompts.content: Write a brief for {{CMO's name}} detailing our partnership with {{influencer name}}, including {{campaign details}} and {{expected outcomes}}.

prompts.name: Product Launch Campaign
prompts.description: This template assists in outlining a product launch campaign. {{Product name}} refers to the item being introduced, {{target audience}} is the primary demographic, and {{campaign length}} is its duration.
prompts.content: Craft a comprehensive product launch campaign for {{CMO's name}} for {{product name}}, primarily targeting {{target audience}}, over a period of {{campaign length}}.

prompts.name: Market Research Summary
prompts.description: This template helps condense significant market research findings. {{Market trends}} refer to notable patterns, {{competitive activities}} to what competitors are doing, and {{opportunities}} to potential market gaps.
prompts.content: Present a market research summary for {{CMO's name}}, highlighting {{market trends}}, {{competitive activities}}, and future {{opportunities}}.
